word_mean: 消化不良：消化能力和消化机能的损害，通常指饭后上腹部不适

sentence.Network_en: Result: Domperidon was a best drug for functional dyspepsia.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果: 用西沙必利治疗功能性消化不良为最佳治疗药物.

sentence.Network_en: Usage may induce gastric irritation, nausea, dyspepsia and stomach bleeding.
sentence.Network_cn: 本药的服用方式可能导致胃痛 、 恶心 、 消化不良和胃出血.

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE : To observe the therapeutic effect of Weixiao mixture on functional dyspepsia.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 观察胃消合剂治疗功能性消化不良的疗效.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 消化不良(dyspepsia)是一种临床症候群，是由胃动力障碍所引起的疾病，也包括胃蠕动不好的胃轻瘫和食道反流病。消化不良主要分 …
dyspepsia中文 ... dysosmia 嗅觉障碍 dyspepsia 胃弱 dyspepsiaindigestion 消化不良.
转小乔积累总结的英语医学词汇_Land of... ... scurvy 坏血症 dyspepsia 消化不良症 alopecia 秃头症.
peptic 助消化的dyspepsia 消化不良的dyspepsy 消化不良

nervous diarrhea 神经性腹泻nervous dyspepsia 神经性消化不良, 精神性消化不良nervous eructation 神经性嗳气
acid cell 酸细胞 acid dyspepsia 胃酸过多性消化不良 acid fast 耐酸的 acid fast bacteria 抗酸性杆菌 acid glands 胃酸腺 acid intoxication 酸中毒 acid milk.
dyspepsia是... ... feculent dyspepsia 粪积性消化不良 functional dyspepsia 机能性消化不良 intestinal dyspepsia 肠消化不良.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: via Latin from Greek duspepsia, from duspeptos 'difficult to digest'

entry.def: Dyspepsia is the same as indigestion .

means.word_mean: 1. a disorder of digestive function characterized by discomfort or heartburn or nausea

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"病"; 2. 表名词,"总称,状态等"

dys坏,不良+lex词+ia病→读词不行
dys坏+peps消化;胃+ia病→消化不好
hypo在……下面+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
in不+somn睡眠+ia病→n.失眠症
pyro火+man狂+ia病→n.纵火狂
ambros不死的+ia总称,状态等→n.神仙食品,美味
corn角+u+cop丰富+ia表示物→表示丰富的角→丰饶角
in内部+sign信号+ia总称,状态等→内部标志
